resources.string: This Application is developed by Aniket Thakur

1. Choose who goes first.
2. Enter your name in place of Player1 and Player2 by taping on them(Optional).
3.First Player has X symbol and the second Player has O symbol.
4.These symbols will be placed on the table, in the attempt to have three of them in a row.
 5.The players take turns putting their symbol on the table.
6.The first player to have 3 of their symbols in a row, whether it is horizontally, vertically, or diagonally, is the winner.
\n1. Sound can be toggled On or Off from the settings. Current status of Sound(On or OFF) is shows on the toggle sound label.\n
